title: 16 Bit Fantasy RPG Music Pack
description: 16 royalty free authentic 16-bit console style songs!
longDescription:
Are you looking for high-quality, retro-inspired video game music for your project? Look no further than my console inspired 16-Bit Fantasy music pack!


This pack features a collection of 16 original compositions inspired by the 16-bit era, designed to transport you back to the golden age of gaming. With a mix of upbeat, action-packed tracks and atmospheric, ambient melodies, this music pack is the perfect choice for any project that needs a touch of nostalgia and retro charm.


Each track in this music pack is professionally composed and produced to the highest standards, with crystal-clear sound and top-notch instrumentation. And best of all, it's 100% royalty-free, so you can use it in your commercial or personal projects without any worries or restrictions.


Whether you're working on a classic platformer, an action-packed fantasy, or a sprawling RPG, this console-inspired music pack is the perfect choice for your project. So why wait? Download this music pack today and start creating the ultimate retro gaming experience!


Create some new nostalgia with some killer classic 16-bit chiptune sounds!


LISTEN BEFORE YOU BUY HERE:

https://on.soundcloud.com/JHUtCcsEKqgwXHEj8
technicalDetails:
Features:

 Tracklist

  1. The Adventure Begins (Main Theme)
  2. Feels Like Home (Village Theme)
  3. A Familiar Place (Dungeon Theme)
  4. The Lone Warrior (Character Theme)
  5. Mystic Forest (Dungeon Theme)
  6. The Royal Family (Castle Theme)
  7. Ol' Man Shopkeep (Shop Theme)
  8. Through The Grotto (Dungeon Theme)
  9. Onward (World Map Theme)
  10. Heavy Air (Dungeon Theme)
  11. Journey Across the Blue (Boat Theme)
  12. We'll Be Right Back (Cutscene Theme)
  13. Crystal Clear (Dungeon Theme)
  14. Fun Times (Village Theme)
  15. Ominous (Villain Theme)
  16. Origins (Cutscene Theme)
  •  Royalty Free
  •  Authentic SNES sound

Number of Audio Wavs: 16

Number of Audio Cues: 16

Sample rate / bit rate: 44,100 Hz / 16 bit

Does music loop: Yes

Minutes of audio provided: 23:10

Supported Development Platforms:

Windows: Yes

Mac: Yes

Documentation: License notes here
